import React,{useState}from"react";import{useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import axios from"axios";import logo from"../images/logo.jpg";import'../styles.css';// Import common styles
import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Filter=()=>{const navigate=useNavigate();// State variables to manage client name, inflatable, and filtered rentals
const[clientName,setClientName]=useState("");const[inflatable,setInflatable]=useState("");const[filteredRentals,setFilteredRentals]=useState([]);// Function to navigate to Rental Insertion page
const goToRentalInsertion=()=>{navigate("/rental-insertion");};// Function to navigate to Login page
const goToLogin=()=>{navigate("/");};// Function to handle search based on client name and inflatable
const handleSearch=async()=>{try{const response=await axios.get("".concat(process.env.REACT_APP_BACKEND_URL,"/rental?name=").concat(clientName,"&inflatable=").concat(inflatable));setFilteredRentals(response.data);// Update filtered rentals based on API response
}catch(error){console.error("Error fetching filtered rentals:",error);}};// Function to reset filters and clear filtered rentals
const resetFilters=()=>{setClientName("");setInflatable("");setFilteredRentals([]);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"header",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"button",onClick:goToLogin,children:"Log Out"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:logo,alt:"Logo",className:"logo"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"button",onClick:goToRentalInsertion,children:"Rental Insertion"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"form-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"title",children:"Filter Options"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"form-group",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"clientName",children:"Client Name:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",id:"clientName",name:"clientName",value:clientName,onChange:e=>setClientName(e.target.value)})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"form-group",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"inflatable",children:"Inflatable:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",id:"inflatable",name:"inflatable",value:inflatable,onChange:e=>setInflatable(e.target.value)})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"button-group",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"button",onClick:handleSearch,children:"Search"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"button",onClick:resetFilters,children:"Reset"})]}),filteredRentals.length>0&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"list",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"title",children:"Filtered Rentals"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:filteredRentals.map(rental=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{className:"list-item",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Name:"})," ",rental.name,/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Address:"})," ",rental.address,/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Email:"})," ",rental.email,/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{})]},rental._id))})]})]})]});};export default Filter;
